subject: Shifter
description_text:
Hi, can this be made into a sequential shifter as well? Simsonn 6+R H Gear Shifter – Precision Engineering for Ultimate Sim Racing Control – SIMSONN<https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-hexagonal-shifter>
If not, I would love it if you made a shifter that can act both as H and sequential, kinda like Fanatec SQ v1.5 and Simagic DS-8X.


Best regards,
Trygve

conversations.body_text: Hi Trygve Thom,    Yes, our dual-mode shifter is scheduled for release in November.

Fantastic! ?
Looking forward to seeing reviews of it. I hope you will try to keep the feel and function of the 6+R H shifter, as judging by reviews it hits a nice balance between feel, force and noise levels. Just what I'm looking for really, except the missing sequential function obviously.

Best regards,
Trygve
